column1: Describe the relationship between the magnetic poles and the magnetic field lines produced by a permanent magnet.
Relate the direction and strength of the magnetic field at a given point to magnetic field vector and magnetic field lines.
Describe the orientation of the Earth's magnetic field and relate it to how a homing pigeon may use it for navigation.
Describe the direction and magnitude of the magnetic field produced from a long, straight wire carrying current.
Calculate the magnitude of the magnetic field produced by a long, straight, current-carrying wire.
Describe the direction and magnitude of the magnetic field produced from a wire loop carrying current.
Calculate the magnitude of the magnetic field produced at the center of a current loop of radius R.
Calculate the magnitude of the magnetic field produced at the center of a thin coil of wire with N turns.
Calculate the magnitude of the magnetic field produced at the center of a solenoid of length L with N turns.
